|ram2_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Broadcom;; |cm_down_c = 8 |cm_up_c = 4 |docsisver = 3.0 |voip_ports = |wan_ports = |wan_speed = |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 00:1D:D4, CC:A4:62 |oui = 00:1D:D4, CC:A4:62 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 115-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 0.7 |pwr_conn = C7P |serial = yes |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = DOCSIS 3.0, battery backup |addchip = Digital Cable Front-End Receiver;MaxLinear;;;1; |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = TG862GXX |defaultssid_regex = ^TG862G[A-F0-9]{2}$ |default_ch = |manuf = SerComm |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = common |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 07/18/2011 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B008KRLZCW |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Ralink;RT3352;RT3352F, P4G5310400, 1112STA1;; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== [http://www.arrisi.com/product_catalog/_docs/_specsheet/TG862G_TS_16JUL11.pdf Spec sheet] :Per the spec sheet, this is a 8x4 modem. There are likely a few different revisions of this device. Some are detailed below.. :''SerComm'' would appear to manufacture this device. {{WiFiCert|WFA12057|07/21/2011}} See also [[Arris TG1862G]] ([[Talk:Arris TG1862G|talk]]).. ===P/Ns=== *TG862G/TW-0 (presumably for TWC) :- TG862GXX SSID format, CC:A4:62 OUI, rounded model *TG862G/CT (presumably Comcast specific) :- 00:1D:D4 OUI, boxy model, ''Xfinity'' branded *TG862G/NA (generic North American unit?) :- ARRIS-XXXX SSID format, rounded model ===Likely compatible services=== *{{Approved by service|Comcast}} ([http://mydeviceinfo.comcast.net/device.php?devid=320 ''Comcast'' device database entry]) *[http://www.speedguide.net/routers/arris-touchstone-tg862-voip-wireless-cable-gateway-2488 ''Arris Touchstone TG862'' on '''SpeedGuide'''] ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== Marked "J1". 3.3V UART. 
* Pin 1: +3.3V
* Pin 2: TX
* Pin 3: RX
* Pin 4: GND
{{/Serial info}} [[Category:English Documentation]]
